actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-798.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5290) to establish a temporary program under which parenteral diacetylmorphine will be made available through qualified pharmacies for the relief of intractable pain due to cancer.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5290 (cancer drug treatment program).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5290) to establish a temporary program under which parenteral diacetylmorphine will be made available through qualified pharmacies for the relief of intractable pain due to cancer.
